attributes.action: back british industry by awarding contracts for new-build trains to Bombardier - Britain's last remaining train-maker.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bombardier, Britain's only train maker, should be awarded the contracts to build the new intercity trains. The contracts should not go to the Hitachi consortium as this could eventually lead to Bombardier deciding to close it's british train-making facilities, leading to thousands of job losses.
